title: What is an interface in technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: When we referring interface in technology then It's defined in Two different ways Software interface and Hardware Interface. Let's start! an interface is a program that allows a user to connect computers in person or over a network. An interface can also refer to controls that allow the user to interact with the program used in a program. An example of an interface is a Graphic user Interface(GUI). What you are using now to access your device and how you got to this page is this type of interface. A hardware interface is used to connect two devices together. Such as, a printer typically connects to a computer via a USB interface. So, the USB port is Of the computer is a hardware interface.

Interface is required for connecting two separate devices. For instance, a Printer can be connected to a Computer using Serial, Parallel or Universal Serial Bus (USB) interface. The telephone cable can be connected to the instrument using RJ11 type of interface. The screen of a mobile phone may be connected to the TV using a particular type (HDMI) interface.
